p: The obtained actinomycetes biomass was washed thrice with sterile distilled water to remove any adhering medium components, followed by suspension in 100 mL distilled water and maintained at 30 ± 2 °C for 72 h. Then, the mixture was filtered through Whatman filter paper No.1. Ultimately, the filtrate was collected to be ready for the bioreduction of AgNO 3 (precursors for Ag-NPs).
